about.heading: About Meee
paragraphs: I'm Manoj, a passionate developer with a love for building innovative tech solutions.
My expertise includes React, Express, Django, and Machine Learning.
I enjoy solving complex problems, exploring AI, and staying updated with the latest tech trends. When I'm not coding, you can find me reading books or playing cricket! üèèüìö

items.title: Food Order System
items.description: A full-stack food ordering system where users can browse food items, add them to the cart, and place orders.

items.title: FindMyNest
items.description: A rental room listing website where homeowners can list properties and users can book accommodations.
items.techStack: Django, MySQL, Google Maps API, TensorFlow

items.title: YelpCamp
items.description: A campground review platform where users can explore, add, and review campgrounds.

items.title: Face Emotion Recognition
items.description: A real-time AI system to detect facial emotions using OpenCV and TensorFlow.

items.title: Crime Detection Using Video Surveillance
items.description: AI system for identifying crimes using CCTV footage with YOLO object detection.

items.title: Sales Analysis and Visualization
items.description: Interactive sales data dashboard built with Python libraries for visual storytelling.

items.title: FindMyMentor
items.description: Platform that connects mentors and students based on subject expertise and interests.

items.title: AI-Powered Chatbot for Conversational PDF Interaction
items.description: Streamlit web app enabling users to chat with PDF documents using natural language queries. Implemented a RAG pipeline with LangChain, FAISS, and LLMs for PDF parsing, chunking, vector storage, and context-aware QA with source referencing. Deployed on Streamlit Community Cloud and optimized for real-time performance.

items.title: Programming for Everybody (Getting Started with Python)

highlights: Built Smart Attrition Prediction and Employee Wellness Engine.

Integrated performance dashboards using Power BI & Streamlit.
